course_title: Variable Topics in Women, Gender & Sexuality Studies: Read.Together Israel/Palestine
class_notes:
Topic:  Reading Together on Israel/Palestine
This is a reading club for all of us to learn together about the region of Israel/Palestine. We will most likely be reading Enemies and Neighbors: Arabs and Jews in Palestine and Israel, 1917-2017 by journalist Ian Black. We might also have guest speakers. This reading club is aimed at undergraduates of all years. There will be no assignments beyond doing the reading and contributing to discussions.  We look forward to learning together. Note* Readings may be subject to change during the course of this class as necessary.


Note* This course will meet every other Friday


(S/U Only)
